description:
Sledding and snowball fights aren’t the only things that should get little explorers excited about winter. Moose has created the Fat Moose for all those kids that cannot get enough of their bike. Wearing big 4in. Kenda tires, this bike rolls over snow and ice like it is hero dirt. A 7-speed Shimano drivetrain helps smooth out the hills and takes some of the grunt work out of riding on soft terrain. While mechanical disk brakes let riders keep their speed right where they want it.

  • Designed for riders from 6-9 years old
  • Light and strong 6061 aluminum frame
  • Shimano Tourney 7-speed drivetrain crisp reliable shifts and offers a good amount of mechanical advantage
  • Shimano SIS shifter has an indicator window and is easy to use while wearing winter gloves
  • ProMax mechanical disc brakes have plenty of stopping power
  • Kenda Krusade Sport tires have plenty of grippy lugs with wide spacing to clear mud and snow
  • Crank has as protective guard to keep snow pants safe
  • Flat pedals are wide, stable, and pair well with snow boots
name: Moose Bicycle Fat Moose 20in Bicycle - Youths
